text: ides the following list of signs and symptoms for Mucopolysaccharidosis type VI. Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Abnormality of epiphysis morphology 90% Abnormality of the nasal alae 90% Coarse facial features 90% Limitation of joint mobility 90%
